h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave
content: One of the most basic attacks will be when it spews out a group of bloody projectiles from its body. They'll take to the air before arcing slowly over in your direction, but spinning your staff can let you clear them without issue.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave'.
The content is as follows:
One of the most basic attacks will be when it spews out a group of bloody projectiles from its body. They'll take to the air before arcing slowly over in your direction, but spinning your staff can let you clear them without issue.
